channel.title: Im stealing wireless internet off of a router do i need to portforward?
channel.description: ok so its like this... im stealing wireless internet off of a router and me and my friend can get on in the same house idk whats happening cuz we can use the no-ip i made but no one else can they have to use my hamatchi ip so is my server hamatchi? is there anyway to make it non hamatchi??? please help me!!!

hmm it let me start server now i just need to get someone to test it out any takers???

item.title: Im stealing wireless internet off of a router do i need to portforward?
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

Ok, after you done the Utorrent part, click RUN.bat in your SERVER FILES not at moparisthebest.com client! And Utorrent MUST be on while your server is on then, but remember:
click: RUN.BAT in your server files NOT START SERVER IN MOPARSCAPE CLIENT

item.title: Im stealing wireless internet off of a router do i need to portforward?
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

Istall µTorrent:

utorrent.com

µTorrent - a (very) tiny BitTorrent client

The official µTorrent® (uTorrent) torrent client for Windows, Mac, Android and Linux-- uTorrent is the #1 BitTorrent download client on desktops worldwide.

Open It:

Click: Options > Preferences > Connection: It will look like this:

Port Used Fpr Omcomin Connections: then replace the number with 43594.

Voila, now peoples can log in with your NO-IP…

Hope i helped.

Im not sure if this was what you needed help with…
